text: The United States participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The U.S. Team consisted of 82 athletes competing in 18 sports: aquatics (swimming and diving), archery, badminton, basketball, boxing, equestrian, fencing, gymnastics, judo, modern pentathlon, sailing, table tennis, taekwondo, track & field, triathlon, volleyball, weightlifting and wrestling.The latest news from the USOC - July 19 ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- !
